com.navis.framework.portal

Class BizPortalPea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.business.BaseSessionPea
      • com.navis.framework.portal.BizPortalPea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BizPortalFacade

    public class BizPortalPea
extends BaseSessionPea
implements BizPortalFacade
    Pea version of BaseSessionBean. Should only be invoked in standalone testing. This pea supports resource local transactions which is now the only default.

      • processNonDatabaseRequest

        public BizResponse processNonDatabaseRequest(BizRequest inRequest)

        Parameters:

      • recoverObsoleteEntities

        public void recoverObsoleteEntities(BizRequest inRequest,
                                    BizResponse inOutResponse)
                             throws BizViolation
        This function is used to recover obsolete entities (basically setting the LifeCycleState to Active).
        Specified by:
        recoverObsoleteEntities in interface BizPortalFacade
        Parameters:
        inRequest - Requires 2 parameters values to be set (using setParameterValue) 1) ArgoBizMetafields.BASE_ENTITY_GKEYS needs to be set to Serializeable[], an array of primary keys of the entities to be recovered. 2) ArgoBizMetafields.BASE_ENTITY needs to be set to the N4 entity name (String).
        inOutResponse - contains only the errors
        Throws:
        BizViolation
